movies.title: Scooby-Doo Meets Batman
movies.plot: Protecting the innocent, thwarting injustice and stuffing Scooby snacks! That's the crime-fighting join forces as Scooby-Doo and the Mystery, Inc. gang team up with Batman and Robin.
movies.simplePlot: Protecting the innocent, thwarting injustice and stuffing Scooby snacks! That's the crime-fighting join forces as Scooby-Doo and the Mystery, Inc. gang team up with Batman and Robin.
